roll

public static java.lang.String roll(java.lang.String diceExpr,

Roll the given dice expression the requested number of times.

Parameters:
diceExpr - the dice expression, e.g., 3d6+5
numRolls - the number of times to roll the expression
Returns:
the results in an enumerated list of rolls

roll

public static java.lang.String roll(java.lang.String diceExpr)
Parse the given dice expression and roll it.

Parameters:
diceExpr - the dice expression, e.g., 3d6+5
Returns:
the results in expr = result format, e.g., 3d6+5 = 17
